name: library-buddy-backend
description: Main backend for all components of the library-buddy ecosystem. Will serve (library-buddy-dashboard, library-buddy-kiosk, and library-buddy). On top of this, providiing an api for needed functionality (Users, UserBooks, ActivityLog, Students and Library) - all collections within MongoDB. In the future will provide this capability to (library-buddy-dashboard-app and library-buddy-kiosk-app).
author: Joshua Kemp
